review_data.title: Overpriced But low quality
review_data.content: I had two soltani and paid 70chf The meat quality was low and no bill was given at the end. They Just accept cash. Won’t go there again.

review_data.title: Essen Sie wie in Tehran!
review_data.content: Wie immer sehr gutes und leckeres Essen. Top Preis -Leistung Service. Gratis Persische Schwarztee wird am Schluss serviert.

review_data.title: Bad food and premises
review_data.content: It's actually not a restaurant but a poor quality kebab. I wouldn't even go there if I want a kebab but go to the city The ceanliness of the stuff is not sure.

review_data.title: Payam
review_data.content: Very delicious Iranian food, cozy place and fair price. Also, Mr Mehdi who owns the resturant is very welcoming and nice person.

review_data.title: Sauber keit

review_data.title: Great service, meals, fresh, and around 20-25 CHF
review_data.content: The service was great. The meals were classic original Persian meals. Great family setting. Salad, stake kabob, basmati rice, and hot tea, all for 25 CHF. Great service and friendly which is not common in Suisse culture was extra for free. I will go again.

review_data.title: Amazing food
review_data.content: Very Small restaurant, casual. The food was really good. The owner was very friendly he made the food himself. It took us 9 mins by car from Ema Suites not far from Marriott hotel. I highly recomend their food. my kids loved it.

review_data.title: Undiscovered treasure
review_data.content: I was bored in Zurich when I decided to look for Iranian resturants. Based on my experience in Iranian restaurants in other countries and Zurich's prices I expected Payam to be stupidly expensive, and honestly not a good experience. I couldn't be more wrong. It...More
